catalog_info.title: Microeconomic Theory II
catalog_info.notes: M., W., 8:40–10; and an optional review on F., 8:40–10 Elon Kohlberg and Sandeep Baliga (Northwestern University) Offered jointly with the Kennedy School as API-112 and with the Business School as 4011.
catalog_info.description: A continuation of Economics 2020a. Topics include game theory, economics of information, incentive theory, and welfare economics.
